# Symbol of Insanity (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 16]], [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth 5,000 gp each)

**Range:** 0 ft.; see text

**Effect:** One symbol

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 356

This spell functions like *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, except that all creatures within the radius of the *symbol of insanity* instead become permanently insane (as the *[[Insanity (Spell)|insanity]]* spell).

Unlike *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, symbol of insanity has no hit point limit; once triggered, a *symbol of insanity* simply remains active for 10 minutes per caster level.

*Note*: Magic traps such as *symbol of insanity* are hard to detect and disable. A rogue (only) can use the [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] skill to find a *symbol of insanity* and [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] to thwart it. The DC in each case is 25 + spell level, or 33 for *symbol of insanity*.
